label: 参勤交代
本: Yoshiwara: The Glittering World of the Japanese Courtesan . University of Hawai'i Press . 1993
説明文: The system of alternating services of daimyō between Edo and their feudal provinces in order to place half the daimyō at any given time close to the shogun. The traveling forced on the daimyō and their retinues kept them effectively under the watchful  eyes of the bakufu and its tight economic control. [大名、幕府]
